Item.sqlserver_body:
CREATE PROCEDURE mpp_getEBOM1(@partId CHAR(32), @identity_list VARCHAR(MAX), @ip_address VARCHAR(32), @cur_user_id CHAR(32), @environment_attributes_xml NVARCHAR(MAX)) AS BEGIN
SELECT cb.id part_bom_id, cb.level level, cb.related_id rel_id, cb.source_id source_id, cb.item_number rel_item_number, cb.name rel_name, cb.CLASSIFICATION rel_classn, cb.quantity quantity, cb.major_rev revision, cb.MAKE_BUY rel_make_buy, cb.generation generation, cb.config_id config_id FROM innovator.mpp_getPartStructure(@partId, @identity_list, @ip_address, @cur_user_id, @environment_attributes_xml) cb ORDER BY cb.level, cb.sort_order
END
Item.name: mpp_getEBOM1
